      • getDestCustomRecordsAsDetachedMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,byte[]> getDestCustomRecordsAsDetachedMap()
        Returns destCustomRecords as a detached map. I.e. modifications in returned map does not affect data in object. A new map is created for each call.
